282347.「他に何か 交換するかい？\n<break>:
Anything else you want to exchange?
<break>

283417.「ＤＱＸショップ出張販売所へ ようこそ！\n 本日は いかがなさいますか？\n<:
Welcome to the DQX Shop Branch Office! What
can I do for you today?
<select_se_off>
Exchange
Explanation
<select_end>
<break>

283418.「他に ご用はありますか？\n<select_se_off>\n交換しにきた\n:
Anything else I can do for you?
<select_se_off>
Exchange
Explanation
<select_end>
<break>

283419.「どのカテゴリの商品を 交換しますか？\n<break>:
What category of product would you like to
exchange?<break>

283420.「どの商品を 交換しますか？\n<break>: Which item would you like to trade?<break>

283421.「交換いただいた商品は 郵便局や\n ご自宅のポスト クローバーバッグに届きます:
Your exchange will be delivered to the post office, your mailbox, your clover bag... So... Would you like to exchange <%sL_GOODS>
for <%nL_POINT_NUM> shop points?

283422.「この商品の中に フリーパスサービスを\n 受けているものが ございますが\n:
I know some of these items have free passes,
but are you sure you want to trade them?<yesno><break>

283423.「この中に 港町レンドア南の\n 取りよせ商チャガナさんから 購入できるものが\:
Some of these items are available for purchase from Chaganah, an orderly in the port city of Lendah South, but are you sure
you want to trade?

283424.「この中に お客様のせんれきに\n 入手記録があるものが ございますが\n 本当:
Some of these items are on your debris, but
are you sure you want to replace them?<yesno><break>

283425.「この中に 以前 ＤＱＸショップで購入したか\n ショップポイントで 交換した記:
Some of these items have been purchased from the DQX Shop or exchanged for Shop Points before... Just to be safe, I'd recommend
checking the list of items available at the post office or the DQX Shop's main store before exchanging them, but are you sure you
want to?

283426.「この中に すでに\n 覚えているものが ございますが\n 本当に交換しますか？:
Some of these things you already remember, do
you really want to trade them?<yesno><break>

283427.「この中に ドルボードプリズムがございますね。\n お客様は まだドルボードに\:
One of these is a dollar board prism...
You're not allowed to ride the dolphin board
yet. Are you sure you want to trade?<yesno><break>

283428.「この中に 錬金釜プリズムがございますね。\n お客様は まだ錬金釜を お持ちで:
One of these is an alchemy kettle prism...
You don't have an alchemy kettle yet, but are
you sure you want to trade it?<yesno><break>

283429.「この中に 魔法の迷宮用の商品がございますね。\n お客様は まだ魔法の迷宮を\:
One of these items is for a magical
labyrinth... You haven't opened the Labyrinth
yet, are you sure you want to trade?<yesno><break>

283431.「この中に 美容院用の商品がございますね。\n お客様は まだ美容院をご利用でき:
One of these products is for a beauty
salon... You can't use the salon yet, but are
you sure you want to trade?<yesno><break>

283432.「<%sL_GOODS>の\n 商品内容は このようになっております。\n<br: The contents of <%sL_GOODS> are as follows...<break>

283433.「<%sL_GOODS>を\n 交換いただく場合は\n こちらの ご注意を ご一:
If you wish to exchange <%sL_GOODS>, please
read this notice...<break>

283435.「この中の フリーパス商品は すでに購入ずみか\n ショップポイントで 交換ずみ:
If you've already purchased or redeemed shop
points for any of these free passes... Then
you don't have to pay...

283436.「それでは またのご来店を\n お待ち申し上げております！: We look forward to seeing you again soon!

283437.「交換いただき ありがとうございました！\n クローバーバッグ品は クローバーバ:
Thank you for the exchange! Clover bag items
will be sent to Clover bag, all other items
will be sent to the post office...

283438.「あら…… どうやらＤＱＸショップ本店が\n 準備中のようですね。\n<br>\:
Oh... Looks like the main DQX shop is being prepared... I'm sorry, but you'll have to wait a bit longer, or check the Adventurer's
Square for an announcement...

283439.プレイヤー専用サイト\nドラゴンクエストＸ 目覚めし冒険者の広場\nhttps::
Player Site
Dragon Quest X: The Awakening Adventurer's Square
https://hirobadqxjp

283440.「あら…… どうやら ＤＱＸショップ本店の\n お客様の記録が 更新されているよ:
Oh... It appears that the customer records at
the DQX Shop have been updated... I'm sorry,
but you'll have to double-check...

283441.「あら…… どうやら うまく\n 交換できなかったようです。\n お手数ですが:
Oh... Apparently, the exchange didn't go
through. I'm sorry to bother you, but you'll
have to ask me again.

283442.「あら？ この商品で 覚えられることは\n すでに 覚えていらっしゃるようですよ:
Oh? It seems you've already learned what this
product can do.

283443.「あら？ この中に 今のお客様では\n ご利用いただけないものが ございますね。:
What? Some of these items may not be available to you right now. I'm sorry to trouble you, but this product must be used
after installing the additional package "Sleeping Beauty and the Guiding Alliance Online".

283444.「あら？ この商品は\n 港町レンドア南の 取りよせ商チャガナさんでも\n 取り:
What? This item is also sold at Chagana's in the port town of Lendoor South. There's a record of its availability in our customer's
records, so if you buy from Chagana, you'll get a great deal!

283445.「あら？ お客様の郵便箱の 空きが足りないので\n この商品が 全て 入りきらな:
What? There's not enough room in your mailbox to hold all of these items. We apologize for the inconvenience, but we're going to have to
re-stock your mailbox.

283446.「あら？ この中に 今のお客様ですと\n ご利用できないものが ございますね。\:
Oh? Some of these items are not available to current customers. We apologize for the inconvenience, but this item is only
available after you complete the quest "Gather, Crown of Wisdom!".

283448.「あら？ お客様のクローバーバッグに\n 期限切れの 同じアイテムが\n 入って:
What? You have the same expired item in your clover bag. You can only have one of these items, so I'm sorry, but you'll have to
discard the expired item before you can exchange it...

283449.「あら？ この商品の １か月の交換上限を\n 超えてしまうので 交換できないよう:
What? You can't exchange this product because
you've exceeded your monthly limit...

283450.「あら？ この商品は\n まだ交換できないようです。すみませんが\n 購入可能に:
What? This item is not yet available for
exchange... I'm sorry, it'll have to wait
until it's available for purchase.

283451.「あら？ お客様のクローバーバッグに\n 期限が切れていない 同じアイテムが\n:
What? You have the same item in your clover bag that hasn't expired yet. You can only have one of these items, so you'll have to
wait until it expires before you can purchase it again.

283452.「ＤＱＸショップでは ほかの店とは一味ちがう\n ドレスアップおしゃれ装備や ド:
At the DQX Shop, you'll find all sorts of unique items like dress-up equipment and prisms that modify the form of dollar
boards... Free Pass items can be reacquired as many times as you like... Dye, dress up, and play with your own designs! When you look
at the details of an item in a fairy's vision, items with a clover symbol are sold in the DQX Shop. You can't sell or trade
items from the DQX Shop in the bazaar.

283454.「こちらは ドラゴンクエストＸの\n 公式サイト『目覚めし冒険者の広場』にある\:
This is the DQX Shop on the official Dragon Quest X website, Awakened Adventurer's Square. By exchanging your shop points, you
can get items sold in the DQX Shop. We have a variety of stylish equipment and useful tools for your adventures, so please take advantage
of them!

283488.「どの説明を聞きますか？\n<select_se_off>\nＤＱＸショップ出張:
Which explanation do you want to hear?
<select_se_off>
What is the DQX shop sales office?
About our products
How to increase your shop points
Introduction of DQX Shop Main Store
Purchase history and free pass reacquisition
<select_end>
<break>

287437.「あら？ ごめんなさい。\n どうやら ショップポイントが\n 足りてないみたい:
Oh, no. Sorry... Looks like we don't have
enough ShopPoints...<bw_break>

287539.「交換いただいたアイテムは 郵便局や\n ご自宅のポスト クローバーバッグに届き:
The items you redeemed will be delivered to the post office, your mailbox, your clover bag... So... Would you like a free pass for
<%sL_GOODS>?

288193.「ショップポイント以外にも 別の通貨を使って\n アイテム商品を買える ＤＱＸシ:
In addition to shop points, you can use other currencies to buy items at the DQX Shop. If you use another currency there, you'll earn
shopping experience... If you accumulate enough of these, you'll be promoted to a higher rank, and you'll be rewarded with some
nice items...

288194.「今まで ＤＱＸショップで購入した アイテムの\n 履歴は 公式サイト『目覚めし:
You can check the history of all the items you've purchased from the DQX Shop by going to the DQX Shop's main store on the official
website, Awakened Adventurer's Square. If you want to reacquire a free pass type item, you can also go to the DQX Shop's main menu and
select "Get Free Pass".

288195.<color_yellow>プレイヤー専用サイト 目覚めし冒険者の広場\nドラゴ:
<color_yellow>Player's Site: The Awakening Adventurer's Square
Dragon Quest X Shop (DQX Shop)
https://sqexto/dqxshop

288851.「あら？ この中に 今のお客様ですと\n ご利用できないものが ございますね。\:
Oh? Some of these items may not be available to you right now. You don't have an address, or you have a house kit that's larger than
your address, but you're sure you want to trade?
